p: The extracts showed different degrees of the percentage of urinary excretion, diuretic action, and diuretic index at both 6th hr and 24th hr. The higher percentage of urinary excretion, diuretic action, and the diuretic index was noticed from the HME followed by EAF and CF, while the lowest was noticed in the AF. The percentage of urinary excretion, diuretic action, and diuretic index of the HME, EAF, and CF showed to rise in a dose-dependent fashion.
